question: Which of the following parts of a plant cell is NOT part of an animal cell?
Which answer gives the correct functions of both the cytoplasm AND the cell membrane?

answers.a:
Cytoplasm: Place where cell reactions take place 
 Cell membrane: Controls what goes in and out of a cell
answers.b:
Cytoplasm: Controls cell division 
 Cell membrane: Gives support to the cell
answers.c:
Cytoplasm: Gives support to the cell 
 Cell membrane: Place where cell reactions take place
answers.d:
Cytoplasm: Controls cell division 
 Cell membrane: Controls what goes in and out of a cell

question: Which of these units is most suitable for measuring the length of a cell?

All of the following organelle interact with ribosomes execpt...
What are ribosomes made up of?
Which of the following statements are true?
Golgi stack is the stack of Golgi cisternae?
Which organelle handles shipping and distributing the protiens and chemicals produced by the cell?

answers.a: Lysosomes - involved in synthesizing amino acids
answers.b: Endoplasmic reticulum - has a role in the formation of a new nuclear membrane whilen
answers.c: Centrosomes - Provides enzymes essential for digestion
